casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Christopher Edward GOSS. No. 316A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 22, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Christopher Edward Goss) shall have up to and including the 12th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of December 2006."
